welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Hilsea, a charming city known for its rich history and beautiful landscapes. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our vibrant community has to offer. We hope you have a memorable stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bembridge Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Bembridge Airport caters to executive and VIP travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Goodwood Airport offers a modern and comfortable waiting area for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Goodwood Airport provides exclusive amenities and services for private jet passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Southampton Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at RAF Station Airport is responsible for all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
